differences.actualValue: <speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>To be reimbursed for your payment, first change the payment method from Plus Card, to Personal Funds. Then, after you've paid, upload a photo of the itemized receipt in the app. Please do not add any tip to the total amount. The photo of your receipt will be automatically processed to make sure it's clearly legible without blurriness, or glare. and as soon as the photo is approved, you can complete the delivery as normal. Your reimbursement will be reflected, on your Uber Balance in the app within 24 to 48 hours. and you will receive this reimbursement, as part of your next weekly payout.<break time="750ms"/></speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
